ModMetaData.name: Questionable Ethics Enhanced
ModMetaData.author: KongMD
ModMetaData.description: Contains organ growing, organ extraction, animal/humanoid cloning, brain reprogramming... and all manner of ethically questionable stuff! If you think that making human leather hats is too mundane, then this mod will spice things up. * Grow organs in vats! * Clone animals and humanoids! Clones have the traits and passions of their "parent". * Scan brains to preserve the skill levels of a pawn! Apply any brain template to your clones, to get them up-to-speed fast. * Recruit hostile pawns instantly with nerve stapling! * Balance the mod as you wish, with the Mod Settings menu * Enhancements to the original Questionable Ethics mod Supports Alien Races out of the box. See the mod description page on Steam for more details!
